A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I seldom pay much attention by the critics reviews\, but do on the people who see the movie.  I read so many bad reviews on this movie\, I almost didn't go see it.  However\, my son wanted to see it\, so I went ahead and went with him.  I was expecting a bad movie\, but WOW was I shocked!  It was one of the best Star War movies I have ever seen.  Just a really GREAT movie!!
